mainText:
After years of the rise, fall, and the rebirth of Apple...Steve Jobs made
the most undermentioned quote ever! "This is our Renaissance!"
His revelation made during the opening of a post 2000 keynote will always be
the most amazing thing he ever said. Besides his
humanity that we all admire, he claimed a world wide win for a company
called Apple. Cheers Steve!
header: One amazing quote from Steven Jobs from a past Keynote...
author: Brian
